Job Title: Security Use Case Developer for Applications (m/f)
Job Description: At a glance, , Design the future, innovate the past, Keeping the bank safe together, that is what matters to us The need for information security is increasing rapidly The financial sector is a permanent target for attackers This is why we continue to search for better ways to make digital banking safer A big responsibility, because a lot is at stake Do you have the knowledge and skills needed to protect our data and a drive to improve security for our customers Then we are looking for you, , , , As Senior Security Engineer you will work for the Application Security Monitoring team which consists of 7 DevSecOps resources Goal of this ASMteam is to protect hundreds of applications against cyberattacks via automation of several generic use cases The team develops, deploys and maintains these use cases and steers the process to onboard all applications to implement those use cases, , , , ABN AMRO is looking for a senior cloud Security Engineer As Security Engineer you work in the CISO Operations  Intelligence department It is a challenging and professional security environment with about 50 security specialists Main goal is to protect the bank against all kinds of cyberattacks CISO Operations  Intelligence is also owner of the technology that drives the SOC, , We look especially for a security specialist who can work as engineerdeveloper in our team and is able to deliver as a team We work in an AgileScrum way of working, , The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated, , , , Basic Skills, , , , , Desirable skills ABN AMRO is migrating to Azure Cloud All Security use cases needs to work in this new environment as well, , Other Skills, , , , An EU working permit is required for this position, , , , We are offering, , , , , , , Interested in this position Please respond to this vacancy online, , For more information you can contact Rob Thiehatten, the IT Engineering Lead of CISO Operations  Intelligence at robthiehattennlabnamrocom, , We are looking forward to meeting you, , We do not respond to acquisition enquiries from agencies

Job description Would you like to work in a young team in one of todays most innovating sectors The coming years we are facing hypergrowth across Europe Therefore, we are looking for an ambitious Process Optimization Analyst for the Customer Service team who will help us with continuously improve and optimize processes related to our customer satisfaction As urbanization is rising and the air quality is deteriorating, we feel the need to make our cities greener and healthier by offering a sustainable mobility solution Besides, we offer a new and fun way around town At felyx, everybody within their own expertise is contributing to a cleaner city by making this swift doortodoor transportation the new status quo We are working together as an ambitious team of entrepreneurs, operators, marketers and engineers, and looking to grow as we scale the business throughout Europe Felyx is one of the few micromobility players in the world that is EBITDA positive on group level with a fleet of c3,000 emopeds We are a young company with more than a hundred employees, working in the operations and at the head office in Amsterdam You can describe us as passionate, ambitious, entrepreneurial, and transparent Do you share our DNA Great Join our ride Heres the challenge Do you get high on data Great, we do too As CS Process Optimization Analyst you will be in charge of supporting the Global Head of Customer Service and are continuously improving processes You will be involved in project management, data analytics and process improvement in the field of Customer Service management Projects, research and operations optimization will be your responsibility Because all processes at Customer Service are related to the performance of other departments, it gives you the opportunity to do interdepartmental projects and see and work closely with a lot of other different departments like BI, Tech and Marketing We are looking for someone that is ready to join our dataride What youll be doing Perform breakdowns of historical data trends and identify points of improvement Track key operational metrics to monitor service performance and quality Help improve datadashboard to get the best information for the organization to improve our insights Identify operational best practices in order to improve overall quality of our services and efficiency of our operation Look for opportunities to improve processes companywide But, important not to forget, is that we encourage you to grow with the company and within your role, so who knows what role you could have in a year or two  as we are continually growing in our journey towards world domination Just kidding, market leader in Europe will do for now Requirements We truly get excited if you Have 2  4 years experience with process optimization Come up with improvements that contribute to optimizing processes or customer satisfaction Have a focus on quality and details, you can challenge a solution and promote different viewpoints if necessary Are very well organized and thrive on being a step ahead Have excellent verbal and written communication skills Possess the ability to translate data into action Have strong analytical skills to discover new insights Are selfmotivated and possess the ability to learn new skills that enable you to grow quickly Bonus points if you Are excited about operating an urban mobility service Are able to communicate in French andor German Have experience building and leading a team Whats in it for me An ambitious team of entrepreneurial colleagues with a lot of passion for our mission A transparent, fastgrowing and inspirational work environment in which you are able to take the lead over your own career and will get challenged to make us grow Unlimited holidays Say what Thats right We value the fact that everyone feels free to go where they want to go in order to flourish while working You never have to worry about transportation anymore since you will get free felyx minutes We want to invest in your future a good pension plan is therefore in place 13 employee, 23 employer Part of our family That means that we care about your personal family Therefore we offer 6 weeks of paternity leave with 100 salary for al upcoming dads We take your development very seriously and encourage you to grow with the company and within your role Once we are able to go back to the office hopefully soon, we offer a tasty en healthy lunch Given the current circumstances, we find it only fair to offer you the material you need to do your job optimally Last but not least fun, freedom and trust Were not scared to work our butts off, but this is only possible once we all experience joy in the work that we do every day We are very proud of the fact that we have been named by Linkedin as a top startup to work at for the second time in a row, together with many other prestigious awards weve received since our start in 2017 We are operational in the cities of Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague, Delft, Groningen, Eindhoven and Brussels and will be launching 10 more Benelux cities in 2020 and 2021 Next to that, we have a strong focus on scaling up internationally

Job Title: Afstudeeropdracht - WO - Informatica. Intent-Based coordination using a Belief-Desire-Intention agent
Job Description: In fast changing markets, customers worldwide rely on Thales Thales is a business where brilliant people from all over the world come together to share ideas and inspire each other In aerospace, transportation, defence, security and space, our architects design innovative solutions that make our tomorrows possible, , Soort opdracht Afstudeeropdracht, , Niveau WO, , Studierichting InformaticaComputer Science, , , , , , , , In the Netherlands, where 2100 employees are based, we are located in four cities Huizen, Delft, Eindhoven and Hengelo HQ Together with an extensive ecosystem of knowledge partners, customers and suppliers, we work on radars for naval vessels, cyber security solutions, transportation systems, communication equipment for land forces, cryogenic cooling solutions and research  development for radar tech in collaboration with TU Delft, , , , Distributed systems are more and more running in a dynamic context Different modes of operation are requested dependent of the ships mission New functionality is regularly added during the lifetime of systems System have to cope with failing hardware resources or have to share hardware resources with other systems, , To be able to built these systems a dynamic architecture is required Within research projects we developed a reference architecture using realtime resource monitoring in combination with constraintbased dynamic deployment to ensure an adaptable system capable of handling resource, environmental andor functional usages, , changes, , The assignment is to research and prototype a BeliefDesireIntention BDI agent to coordinate the desired enduser functionality in terms of high level invariant intents, , The BDI agent should use the existing resource and application monitoring to create a belief set and should instruct the existing constraintbased resolver to actualize the requested intent in a coordinated manner, , The BDI agent must  at least  consider software redundancy for time critical parts, distributed and redundant data storage requirements including delay constraints, expected andor measured jitter and the variability in the input data, , , , support department Planning and managing the high value instrument shipments from DCs to customers Responsible for analyzing all our customer shipping complaints Managing daily centralized email account department Preferred background, skills and experience Experience preparing shipping documents, coordinating international shipments Experience in working with an ERP system preferred, SAP Mechanics, Applied Physics, , Title of the assignment 3D printed waveguides for radar applications, , , , In the Netherlands, where 2100 employees are based, we are located in four cities Huizen, Delft, Eindhoven and Hengelo HQ Together with an extensive ecosystem of knowledge partners, customers and suppliers, we work on radars for naval vessels, cyber security solutions, transportation systems, communication equipment for land forces, cryogenic cooling solutions and research  development for radar tech in collaboration with TU Delft, , Within the RF Engineering department in Hengelo radar frontends are developed This includes the design of antennas, transmitters, signal generators and receivers Besides product development, innovative technology studies are carried out in this field, , , , Waveguides can transport high levels of RF power with low loss The goal of this assignment is to investigate the maturity and possibilities of 3D printing as a manufacturing process for waveguides There are various 3D printing processes for metal as well as polymers like SLM, SLA and SLS Polymer printed parts can be metal plated in our own factory to get the functionality of a metal waveguide All in all, there are many possibilities regarding production processes, materials and post treatments for making printed waveguides that determine how they score regarding RF performance, costs and reliability Using literature study, testing and prototyping we want to gain more insight in these aspects, , , , , , , Affinity andor experience with Mechanics, testing, manufacturing, solution and implementation Create presentation material and documents to demonstrate the solution and future state concepts Support customer meetings with indepth process and data discovery, and present the solution and analysis outcomes Create project schedules, transition and implementation plans, in collaboration with resources from multiple crossfunctional teams Track the progress of projects, and report out to the customer and internal stakeholders, including senior management What are we looking for Bachelors degree in Economics, Supply Chain or Businessrelated studies 34 years of experience in supply chain solutions, operational excellence, process improvement or reporting  analytics Strong Microsoft SQL knowledge at least 23 years of hands on experience Analytical mindset and passion for discovering insights in the data Project Management experience is a plus VBA  Python or R skills are a plus, and eagerness to learn one of the latter two is strongly preferred Job Title: Stage-opdracht - HBO/WO - Informatica. Real-time visualization of Sensor state
Job Description: In fast changing markets, customers worldwide rely on Thales Thales is a business where brilliant people from all over the world come together to share ideas and inspire each other In aerospace, transportation, defence, security and space, our architects design innovative solutions that make our tomorrows possible, , Internship, , HBOWO, , Computer Science, , Realtime visualization of Sensor state, , , , In the Netherlands, where 2100 employees are based, we are located in four cities Huizen, Delft, Eindhoven and Hengelo HQ Together with an extensive ecosystem of knowledge partners, customers and suppliers, we work on radars for naval vessels, cyber security solutions, transportation systems, communication equipment for land forces, cryogenic cooling solutions and research  development for radar tech in collaboration with TU Delft, , , Our department is part of the Thales Surface Radar business line and is responsible for the software development in radar and optical sensors for worldwide naval and air defense systems The work is performed in multidisciplinary teams with specialists in system engineering, functional sensor design and design and realization of realtime embedded systems, , We are working with state of the art software conceptslanguagestools and processes like, , , , , The goal is to implement one dashboard that visualizes the internal state of the radar system software components The challenge is to extract the information from two different middleware stacks We have a 1st and a 2nd generation middleware stack used to house our software components and services, , The current dashboard only displays the internal state of the software components developed on the 1st generation middleware stack For future backend radar systems we developed a 2nd generation middleware stack These future radar systems will house software component from both middleware stacks a hybrid system, , Currently the software developers have limited information available about the status of the radar system They have to dig deep into the system to extract the information they need In order to simplify this process we want to present them with a dashboard that gives a complete overview and where possible detailed information about different parts of the radar system, , , , , , A dashboard showing the different internal states of the radar system software components, , Create design for the dashboard as there is too much information available to present on one simple dashboard It must be possible to show this information in realtime while the radar system is running, , Write extensions in CC on these middleware stack APIs in order to extract all the information needed There is a need to display more information from the radar system than currently is available For example the latency of a functionally related set of messages how long does it take to report a track after the first detection of a target, , Determine the protocol to extract and transfer this information to the dashboard, , , , , , , , , , , , Solliciteer nu Kies voor Apply now en upload jouw CV en motivatie, , Apply now Click on the button Apply now Job Description: In fast changing markets, customers worldwide rely on Thales Thales is a business where brilliant people from all over the world come together to share ideas and inspire each other In level Master, , Studierichtingen Wiskunde, Technische Natuurkunde, Elektrotechniek, , Education Mathematics, Physics, Electrical Engineering or related, , TitelTitle Advanced Radar Processing, , , , In the Netherlands, where 2100 employees are based, we are located in four cities Huizen, Delft, Eindhoven and Hengelo HQ Together with an extensive ecosystem of knowledge partners, customers and suppliers, we work on radars for naval vessels, cyber security solutions, transportation systems, communication equipment for land forces, cryogenic cooling solutions and research  development for radar tech in collaboration with TU Delft, , The department System Engineering is, amongst other things, responsible for the development of radar signal and data processing techniques for radar and EO sensors, including advanced tracking algorithms Tracking is an important element of radar processing and can be described as the processing of sensor measurements obtained from objects in order to estimate the states of these objects, , , , Within the department System Engineering there is a continuous interest in the development of advanced radar processing The trend is towards integrated processing that comprises the simultaneous detection, tracking and classification of targets, , Research topics include target tracking and classification, and related to that, modeling of received radar measurements, dynamic modeling of objects and their environment, exploitation of external knowledge eg digital charts to improve the radar output, Bayesian filtering and machine learning, , The exact topic of the project can be adapted according to the background, the interests of the student and the duration of the project Students who are interested in an applied research project in the above fields, are encouraged to contact us to further discuss the possibilities, , , , Algorithm development, stochastic modeling of physical phenomena, Bayesian signal processing, machine learning, is, is een enorme uitdaging Het Thales Naval Cybersecurity Centre heeft als doel om dit te realiseren en de systemen blijvend te toetsen gedurende hun levensduur, , , , Thales ziet het als haar verantwoordelijkheid om ervoor te zorgen dat haar klanten te allen tijde betrouwbaar gebruik kunnen blijven maken van hun systemen vandaag maar ook morgen, , De toepassing van cybersecurity in productontwikkeling zoals bij Thales geschiedt verschilt van de reguliere IT security Basisprincipes en bouwblokken zijn voor een groot deel gelijk, maar er zijn ook verschillen Binnen een productontwikkelorganisatie gaan de cyberwerkzaamheden gelijk op met allerlei andere engineering werkzaamheden het analyseren van klanteneisen, vaststellen van systeemeisen en systeemarchitectuur, identificeren en specificeren van deelsystemen in hardware en software, uitwerken van infrastructuur en softwareontwerp, integratie van opgeleverde deelsystemen en verificatie op allerlei niveaus, , De cybersecurity architect heeft als taak om de cybersecurityoplossing te standaardiseren, te bewaken en toekomstbestendig te houden Hij levert een essentile bijdrage in de totaaloplossing en fungeert als interface naar de systeemarchitecten uit overige engineering domeinen en naar de cybersecurity engineers, , Als cybersecurity architect binnen een complexe ontwikkelorganisatie ben je constant bezig om de cybersecurityarchitectuur af te stemmen op de dynamiek van de varirende klanteneisen, het portfolio van standaardproducten en de potentile operationele dreigingen Het expertteam van cybersecurity specialisten werkt samen om tot de juiste invulling te komen van de architectuur, zodat optimale flexibiliteit geboden wordt aan de klanten en producteisen, , Jouw kennis en inzicht op Job Description: At UL, we know why we come to work Thousands of us around the world wake up every day with a common purpose to make the world a safer, more secure and sustainable place We take delight in knowing that our work makes a meaningful contribution to society, and we are proud that our culture is centered on integrity, collaboration, inclusion and excellence Satisfying Yes Exciting Absolutely We are currently seeking a Senior Regulatory Specialist with expertise in Environment, Health, Safety, and Transportation EHST regulations The position requires general global Dangerous Goods Transportation knowledge with specific expertise for development and delivery of training programs in accordance with International Air ICAOIATA, Sea IMDG and European ADR Dangerous Goods Transportation regulations addressing areas including but not limited to classification, packaging, marking, labelling, and documentation for all product types for all modes of transport In this role prepare and deliver training programs for international air, sea, and European Dangerous Goods Transportation compliance The training programs will address classification, packaging, marking, labelling, and documentation for all product types and all modes of transport to support safe and compliant transport The Senior Regulatory Specialist also provides subject matter expertise to clients when requested which involves local, regional, national or international knowledge for application of transport regulations to industrial or consumer sectors The Senior Regulatory Specialist utilizes relevant software to support client requests Mentors and trains Regulatory Specialists Interfaces with all levels of management to provide consultation on regulatory requirements

aerospace, transportation, defence, security and space, our architects design innovative solutions that make our tomorrows possible, , Soort opdracht StageAfstudeeropdracht, , Niveau HBO, , Studierichtingen Technische Informatica, , Titel van de opdracht API Schema Evolution, , , , In the Netherlands, where 2100 employees are based, we are located in four cities Huizen, Delft, Eindhoven and Hengelo HQ Together with an extensive ecosystem of knowledge partners, customers and suppliers, we work on radars for naval vessels, cyber security solutions, transportation systems, communication equipment for land forces, cryogenic cooling solutions and research  development for radar tech in collaboration with TU Delft, , The department Application Engineering in Hengelo is responsible for realizing the software of all Naval products developed by Thales Hengelo Software is realized in multidisciplinary teams using Scrum using industry standard tools such as JIRA, Jenkins, Git, Maven etc, , , , Thales systems such as a radar, combat management system or firecontrol system are distributed in nature where multiple separate components realize the function of the system In order for these components to collectively realize the function there are interfaces API, application programming interfaces to allow these components to interact Deploying updates of components could introduce changes to these interfaces which affects the users of these interfaces The risk here is that one change could cascade through the system requiring all transitive dependents to change as well, which is as you could imagine, undesirable This assignment aims to investigate available techniques, framework and or tools that allow the interfaces of the components to evolve and demonstrate how these can be applied, , It is possible to refine the assignment in order to meet specific curriculum criteria, , , , Software architecture, Protobuf, Thrift, Avro, API design  management, software Bingo You can stop searching, this is a job you want Start working as a warehouse employee at UPS in Apeldoorn and earn11,58 per hour Come on, lets go, Wat bieden wij jou, , , , As you can see, muscles are needed for this job as a warehouse employee Furthermore, , , , Well first of all enjoy your day Your shift as a warehouse employee starts at 1730 After a cup of coffee and small talk with your colleagues, you get to work There are lots of packages, big and small, waiting to be sorted and get delivered to the rightful owner You scan the packages and load the trucks for the drivers so they can start delivering the orders the next day Easy peasy, lemon squeezy Or not The packages can weigh up to 25 kilograms so if you go to the gym regularly you might as well just start working here Your shift ends around 2100 but we often work overtime, , , As our new warehouse employee youll get a meaningful job UPS does not only care for the shipping of new games and consumer products Every day they care for the delivery of medical equipment, food and even care packages for those in need Wow you will work in a steady team of people who are always up for a laugh and a cup of coffee, , One last thing left to do, warehouse employee Click the button and fill in your details today My name is Aleksandra and I will contact you the next day to get to know you better Still have some questions No problem Whatsapp me on 0612165218 or call 0384261999 See you soon, Uiteraard staat deze vacature open voor iedereen die zich hierin herkent

NV, the Management Board Banking of ING Bank NV and the Supervisory Board of ING Groep NV and ING Bank NV and its related committees The team is responsible for facilitating and supporting INGs board effectiveness and INGs board related corporate governance processes By proactively managing these two pillars, Corporate Secretariat drives the wide range and variety of the teams duties As a trusted advisor to these boards, the main responsibility of Corporate Secretariat is to organise, coordinate, advise on and take minutes of every board meeting, including the Annual General Meeting AGM of ING Refresco Group is the worlds largest independent bottler of soft drinks and fruit juices for retailers and branded beverage companies With production in the Benelux, Finland, France, Germany, Iberia, Italy, Poland, the UK, the US, Canada and Mexico, our global sourcing and local RD capabilities offer an almost unlimited variety of products, manufactured to customer specifications and requirements In addition to the efficiency of our bottling processes, we can also provide our customers with total supply chain solutions  from planning and sourcing of raw materials and packaging through to warehousing and transportation We are able to develop new concepts and bring these to market in an extremely short time frame Refresco Group is headquartered in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, , Due to our growth we now have a vacancy for a, , , , , , In the newly created role, reporting to the Director Purchasing Europe you will contribute to improving our incoming material quality and the elimination of supplier caused nonconformances as well as manage the process of Supplier Approval and Supplier Monitoring, , The ideal candidate will be able to proactively engage with suppliers to prevent issues from occurring and drive improvements throughout the supply chain Together with our Central Purchasing Managers and the Quality Managers you will create and execute a supplier performance program in which you plan and execute audits of key suppliers You create the audit reports including the list of required actions and see to it suppliers realize the required improvements based on your findings and advise, , You will evaluate major changes in suppliers processes and advice accordingly, , International travel up to 50 across Europe 2 nights per week Due to the current COVID regulations this is temporarily restricted to smart working, , As our Quality and Risk Manager,, , , , , , , If you are interested in this open position and you feel that your profile matches our requirements, feel free to send your application to the Group HR Manager for Refresco Group, Marit C Rompa

Job Description: Project HOPE is an international NGO of more than 500 engaged employees and hundreds of volunteers who work in more than 25 countries, responding to the worlds most pressing global health challenges Throughout our 60year legacy, Project HOPE has treated millions of patients and provided more than 3 billion worth of medicines to local health care organizations around the world We have helped build hundreds of health programs from the ground up and responded to humanitarian crises worldwide, , , , It is our shared responsibility and obligation to treat each other with respect, take affirmative steps to prevent matters involving Sexual Exploitation  Abuse and Trafficking in Persons, and to disclose all potential and actual violations of our Code of Conduct, which may include Conflicts of Interest, Fraud, Corruption, Discrimination or Harassment Together we can reinforce a culture of respect, integrity, accountability and transparency, , , ,  The primary responsibility of the Team Lead is to lead the implementation of services in an emergency setting The Team Lead will serve as Project HOPEs official representative in country, ensuring proper coordination with authorities, Ministry of Health MOH, civil society, and private sector, Donors and full engagement with appropriate coordination mechanisms She will provide strategic direction to the ongoing growth of the response effort for Project HOPE This position will report directly to the Director of Emergency Response  Preparedness, , , , , , , , Other duties as assigned The duties and responsibilities listed are representative of the nature and level of work assigned and are not necessarily allinclusive, , , , , , The physical demands and work environment characteristics described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions, , , , , , Due to the considerable number of inquiries we receive, only candidates who have met the required experience  qualifications for this position will be considered, , However, since we are active around the world in the field of public health, we may wish to retain your CV in our database for otherfuture opportunities, unless you direct us otherwise, , Thank you very much for your interest in Project HOPE

Job Description, , Always wanted to know how our felyx scooters magically recharge themselves Unfortunately, no green fairies are responsible for this Its even better since the people behind the wheel are the felyx team members itself As City Management Intern youll get to contribute to the felyx team by supporting all the ins and outs of running your own business within a business This is your chance to help us make felyx an even bigger success by focusing on strategy and process optimization within felyx Are you the brains we are looking for who is good at improving and finetuning processes from the beginning till the end Then we are looking for you, , As urbanization is rising and the air quality is deteriorating, we feel the need to make our cities greener and healthier by offering a sustainable mobility solution And being a fun way around town is, of course, a great bonus At felyx, everybody within their own expertise is contributing to a cleaner city by making this swift doortodoor transportation the new status quo We are working together as an ambitious team of entrepreneurs, operators and engineers, and looking to grow as we scale the business throughout Europe Do you share our DNA passionate, transparent, ambitious and entrepreneurial Great Join our ride, , What youll be doing, , The main focus of this role is to work on a strategic project in the Global Ops team in order to support the City Managers and, eventually, improve the processes in their cities You ensure that felyx is successfully running its business, including alignment with our local stakeholders in the metropolitan area Youre constantly balancing running daytoday operations with taking a step back to think strategically about initiatives that have the potential to improve our performance regarding, for example, the damage flow of the scooters Coordination and clear communication across the teams are key So to get things done you should be willing to get your hands dirty this is not an internship where you only will be sitting behind your laptop, , Sounds interesting Please also know that we encourage you to grow with the company and within your role so who knows what you could be doing in 1 or 2 years as we are continually growing in our journey towards world domination Just kidding, market leader in Europe will do for now, , We truly get excited if you, , , Bonus points if you, , , At felyx we believe that the best workplace is one that represents the world we live in today This means we believe that diversity in the broadest sense of the word connects us and drives us forward as a company, , We believe that diversity goes hand in hand with different perspectives It is these different perspectives that can help us become better and more innovative in finding solutions for our customers, , And because we believe this can be achieved, we are looking for colleagues who are intrinsically motivated and bring the right experience Gender, age, sexual orientation or origin will never be a factor and will never become one

development this custombuilt toolset, which consists of the following main components, , Within our team, youll be working with a small group on the next iterations of our frontend data solution we call the Global Data Layer, , A library, used by all frontend applications in our online landscape Typescript  Redux, A tailormade documentation framework, Various microservices for internal use, and At a glance, , The world is changing fast and our role as a gatekeeper is changing with it As reflected in our purpose, Banking for better, for generations to come, were committed to a sustainable, stable and safe financial system This makes tracking down financial crime one of our priorities But thats not news to you, of course You know whats happening in the world Youre socially engaged, youre an ethical person and youre keen on innovation You want to do right by clients, the bank and society at large Thats your mission In the Detecting Financial Crime DFC unit, weve brought together every activity the bank undertakes to detect financial crime, whether at our Dutch offices and branches, our subsidiaries in the Netherlands and elsewhere, or our challenger banks By combining knowledge, expertise, and joining forces, we can do a better job of keeping our banking systems free of financial crime and embracing new developments The advancing technology is both an opportunity and a threat Not only does it help us to improve our investigative work, but it also increases the sophistication of organised crime In short, detecting financial crime is an ongoing process that makes the highest possible demands of our expertise and alertness every single day, , , , Imagine that you are a member of the Process Design team who devotes himherself to designing, establishing and maintaining the process architecture for Detecting Financial Crime DFC in ABN AMRO that is fit for the futureYour ideas and expertise contribute to better and more effective work processes within DFC In the meantime, you are also one of the change agents who is actively involved in process related discussionsactivities in different projects, , You will have a steep learning curve You are not only a process modelling expert but also have an interest in detecting financial crime and the processes that support this domain, , , , , , , , , As Process Manager you will contribute to a futureproof foundation for an efficient and effective process architecture in DFC Within your role as process manager you are part of the Process Design team in Innovation  Design part of DFC, which consists of a team of about 12 members The team members have a background in project management, DFC subject matter and business expertise Your will work closely with colleagues in the various business lines and with colleagues in other teams in DFC Therefore, you collaborate with stakeholders on a global level, including second line parties, , , , Fitting DFC, you are a person with integrity and innovative by character, with an interest in society You will settle for nothing less than the right thing for our clients, the bank and society as a wholeOur success is driven by smart thinking combined with a handson, cando mentality Your track record showsYou have a Bachelors degree in a related fieldYou have experience in a process designanalysisprocess management related roleYou have experience with project managementYou are resilient and solution orientedYou have excellent oral and written communication skills in English mandatory and Dutch preferredYou have experience with ARIS ConnectYou have experience with CCL Module in ARIS ConnectPreferably a Lean certificate eg Greenbelt You have between one and four years work experience, , , , An opportunity to be part of a highly visible team within DFC and the bankA challenging job in which you own your success and have a direct impact on team resultsA position in which you can grow, both personally and professionally, , , , , , , , , ,
